---
category: news
title: "Future AI algorithms have potential to learn like humans, say researchers"
excerpt: "Memories can be as tricky to hold onto for machines as they can be for humans. To help understand why artificial agents develop holes in their own cognitive processes, electrical engineers at The Ohio State University have analyzed how much a process called “continual learning” impacts their overall performance."
